Text: Phillips New WellBelow is a new well Phillips has completed in the Panhandle that appears to be very close to a TW pipeline Would you be the person I would discuss a possible interconnect with TW Trumbell Morrow test Sherman County Texas FNL FWL Section BlkTTNO Survey Perforated morrow interval Well kick off and flowed MMcfd fp psi Shut in well w psi at wellhead Shut well for pipeline connect Recommend high pressure connect Thanks Barry Stuart Phillips Petroleum Company fax
